activities: Tickle administers online personality tests which include the collection of personal information including email address, name, location, education level and can include a picture submitted by the user for their profile.  Tickle does not sell any personally-identifiable information to any 3rd parties without the permission from the user.  The information is stored in an encrypted, secure database which is protected by firewalls.
recoursemech: Tickle operates a 24-hour customer service organization which can be reached via telephone, fax, email or regular mail at anytime.  The user can access and delete any or all of their information through the website at any time.  Tickle will utilize TRUSTe as its independent recourse mechanism under the Safe Harbor.
